cmds:
bash <<'BASH'
  set -euo pipefail

  if ! command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "Error: bun is not installed. Install it from https://bun.sh before continuing." >&2
    exit 1
  fi
  echo "✔️ you are setup"
  BASH

script.desc: Watch and run scripts/run.ts via bun.
